languages.text: "Пффф. Нет, конечно. Ну я слышал, что преподобный Иеронимус молился за их души — что в его исполнении звучало скорее как "их настигла кара, и поделом". Это самая лучшая помощь, на которую они могут рассчитывать".
"Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."
languages.original_text: "Пффф. Нет, конечно. Ну я слышал, что преподобный Иеронимус молился за их души — что в его исполнении звучало скорее как "их настигла кара, и поделом". Это самая лучшая помощь, на которую они могут рассчитывать".

traits.locale_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' It's the best help they can count on."

"Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' It's the best help they can count on."

"Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

languages.text: “啧，当然没有了。我是说，我听说希罗尼穆斯牧师一直在为那些人祈祷，不过祷词听起来却像是‘那些人遭到了报应，遭到了理所应当的报应。’我估计那些人也没有别的东西能指望了。”
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: “啧，当然没有了。我是说，我听说希罗尼穆斯牧师一直在为那些人祈祷，不过祷词听起来却像是‘那些人遭到了报应，遭到了理所应当的报应。’我估计那些人也没有别的东西能指望了。”

languages.text: «Ja. Claro que no. Bueno, he oído al reverendo Hieronymus rezar por sus almas, aunque más bien decía que "el peso de la justicia recae sobre sus almas, y con razón". No pueden esperar que hagamos más».
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: «Ja. Claro que no. Bueno, he oído al reverendo Hieronymus rezar por sus almas, aunque más bien decía que "el peso de la justicia recae sobre sus almas, y con razón". No pueden esperar que hagamos más».

languages.text: 「アハハ、もちろんありません。いやぁ、ヒエロニムス司祭が犠牲者の魂を想って祈りを捧げたとは聞きましたが、どちらかと言うと『天罰が下った、当然の報いだ』って聞こえますけどね。期待できる最大限がこれですよ」
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: 「アハハ、もちろんありません。いやぁ、ヒエロニムス司祭が犠牲者の魂を想って祈りを捧げたとは聞きましたが、どちらかと言うと『天罰が下った、当然の報いだ』って聞こえますけどね。期待できる最大限がこれですよ」

languages.text: "Pff. Natürlich nicht. Na ja, Reverend Hieronymus hat für ihre Seelen gebetet – aber es klang eher nach 'Vergeltung hat sie heimgesucht, und das zu Recht.' Auf mehr können sie nicht hoffen."
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: "Pff. Natürlich nicht. Na ja, Reverend Hieronymus hat für ihre Seelen gebetet – aber es klang eher nach 'Vergeltung hat sie heimgesucht, und das zu Recht.' Auf mehr können sie nicht hoffen."

languages.text: « Pfft. Bien sûr que non. Enfin, il paraît que le révérend Hiéronymus prie pour les âmes des victimes, mais j'ai plutôt l'impression que ça veut dire : "Ils devaient l'avoir mérité, c'est bien fait pour leur pomme." En tout cas, c'est tout ce qu'ils auront. »
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: « Pfft. Bien sûr que non. Enfin, il paraît que le révérend Hiéronymus prie pour les âmes des victimes, mais j'ai plutôt l'impression que ça veut dire : "Ils devaient l'avoir mérité, c'est bien fait pour leur pomme." En tout cas, c'est tout ce qu'ils auront. »

languages.text: "Peh. Elbette hayır. Yani Muhterem Hieronymus, ruhları için dua ediyor tabii. Gerçi o dualar da daha çok 'belalarını buldular" temalı. Kaderlerine razı olacaklar artık."
languages.original_text: "Pfft. Of course not. I mean, I heard Reverend Hieronymus has been praying for their souls — which sounded more like, 'Retribution fell upon them, and rightly so.' That's the most they can hope for."

traits.locale_text: "Pfff... Tabii ki hayır. Yani, Muhterem Hieronymus ruhları için dua ediyor tabii ama 'belalarını buldular" temalı daha çok. Bu kadarıyla yetinecekler."
